entry.title: STORM SURGE WARNING , Gaspé
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:05 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Gaspé
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:04 PM EST Thursday 22 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -12.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gaspé Airport 08:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -12.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -14.9°C
Wind: WSW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and blowing snow beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow changing to rain at times heavy after midnight. Snowfall amount 20 to 30 cm. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 100 near the coast. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending early in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
